titleStmt.title: Corante, or newes from Italy, Germany, Hungarie, Spaine and France. 1621

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for N. B[utter] September the 24. 1621. out of the Hie Dutch coppy printed at Franckford,

notesStmt.note: Caption title. Printer's name from STC.
The earliest extant issue of a coranto series printed in London--Cf. Dahl.
Identified as STC 5748 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

person.persName: N. B[utter] September the 24. 1621. out of the Hie Dutch coppy printed
